00013 typedef struct dbAddr {
00014    struct dbCommon *precord;    /* address of record                   */
00015    void *pfield;                /* address of field                     */
00016    void *pfldDes;               /* address of struct fldDes             */
00017    void *asPvt;                 /* Access Security Private              */
00018    long no_elements;            /* number of elements (arrays)          */
00019    short field_type;            /* type of database field               */
00020    short field_size;            /* size (bytes) of the field being accessed */
00021    short special;               /* special processing                   */
00022    short dbr_field_type;        /* field type as seen by database request */
00023    /*DBR_STRING,...,DBR_ENUM,DBR_NOACCESS */
00024 } DBADDR;

00026 typedef struct pnRestartNode {
00027    ELLNODE node;
00028    struct putNotify *ppn;
00029    struct putNotify *ppnrestartList;    /*ppn with restartList */
00030 } PNRESTARTNODE;
00031 
00032 
00033 typedef struct putNotify {
00034    /*The following members MUST be set by user */
00035 #ifdef __STDC__
00036    void (*userCallback) (struct putNotify *);   /*callback provided by user */
00037 #else
00038    void (*userCallback) ();     /*callback provided by user */
00039 #endif
00040    struct dbAddr *paddr;        /*dbAddr set by dbNameToAddr */
00041    void *pbuffer;               /*address of data */
00042    long nRequest;               /*number of elements to be written */
00043    short dbrType;               /*database request type */
00044    void *usrPvt;                /*for private use of user */
00045    /*The following is status of request. Set by dbPutNotify */
00046    long status;
00047    /*The following are private to database access */
00048    CALLBACK callback;
00049    ELLLIST waitList;            /*list of records for which to wait */
00050    ELLLIST restartList;         /*list of PUTNOTIFYs to restart */
00051    PNRESTARTNODE restartNode;
00052    short restart;
00053    short callbackState;
00054    void *waitForCallback;
00055 } PUTNOTIFY;

00057 /*

00059  * (included here because these routines use dbAccess.h and their
00060  * prototypes must also be included in db_access.h)
00061  */

00063 int db_name_to_addr(const char *pname, DBADDR * paddr);

00065 int db_get_field(DBADDR * paddr, int dest_type, void *pdest, int no_elements, void *pfl);
00066 #else
